subtitleNullable: Semantic segmentation masks and visualisations, legs dataset
descriptionNullable:
# Legs Segmentation

The human recognition dataset is an example of a dataset that we've collected for a shoe company for the neural network to do a shoe size recommendation system. 

# 💴 For Commercial Usage: To discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset, leave a request on **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/legs-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=legs-segmentation)** to buy the dataset

## SIMILAR DATASETS:
- **[Bald People Segmentation Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/bald-people-segmentation-dataset)**
- **[Dataset of bald people, 5000 images](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/tapakah68/dataset-of-bald-people)**
- **[Body Segmentation - 5,300 Photos](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/human-segmentation-dataset)**
- **[Selfies, ID Images dataset (5591 sets of 15 files)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/tapakah68/selfies-id-images-dataset)**
- **[Face segmentation](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/tapakah68/face-segmentation)**

# Content
Dataset includes 2 folders:
- img - original images 
- masks - semantic segmentation masks for images

More then 10 categories of annotation (according to the technical instruction). 
On your demand we collect similar dataset according to your technical instructions (guides) to help you with your specific project's challenge.

# 💴 Buy the Dataset: This is just an example of the data. Leave a request on **[https://trainingdata.pro/datasets](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/legs-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=legs-segmentation)** to discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset

# **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/legs-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=legs-segmentation)** provides high-quality data annotation tailored to your needs.
